name: Potion
description: Restores a small amount of Health. Try to combine these into something Mega-better!

name: Mega Potion
description: Restores a moderate amount of Health. This potion is a hunter's best friend.

name: Nutrients
description: Very slightly increases your maximum Health level.

name: Mega Nutrients
description: Slightly increases your maximum Health level.

name: Antidote
description: Removes all traces of poison from your system.

name: Immunizer
description: Boosts your natural ability to heal.

name: Dash Juice
description: Lets you run without tiring for a short period of time.

name: Mega Dash Juice
description: Lets you run without tiring for longer than with regular Dash Juice.

name: Demondrug
description: Boosts your Attack by filling you with__guess what? -- demonic strength.

name: Mega Demondrug
description: Boosts your Attack even more than a regular Demondrug.

name: Might Pill
description: Temporarily endows you with the strength of a mighty god. Potent!

name: Armorskin
description: Boosts your Defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.

name: Mega Armorskin
description: Boosts your Defense even more than a regular Armorskin.

name: Adamant Pill
description: Temporarily makes your skin as hard as adamant. Potent!

name: Cool Drink
description: Provides temporary relief from extreme heat.

name: Hot Drink
description: Provides temporary relief from extreme cold.

name: Cleanser
description: Immediately removes any ice or mud on your body. Clean as a whistle!

name: Herbal Medicine
description: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of Health.

name: Max Potion
description: Fully restores Health and increases your maximum Health level all the way.

name: Ancient Potion
description: Fully restores Health and Stamina, and raises the max levels of both all the way,

name: Energy Drink
description: This bottle is all you'll need to wake up! Shakes off sleep and restores Stamina.

name: Air Philter
description: A potion that restores lost Oxygen and allows you to stay underwater longer.

name: GMega Air Philter
description: A potion that restores lost Oxygen and allows you to stay underwater much longer.

name: Lifepowder
description: A Lifecrystal combination used as medicine. Heals with a single touch.

name: Oxygen Supply
description: A bulb filled with Oxygen. Nice to have when you're underwater and out of air.

name: Raw Meat
description: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or used to set a trap.

name: Poisoned Meat
description: Raw Meat that poisons whatever eats it. Makes a great trap.

name: Tinged Meat
description: Raw Meat that paralyzes whatever eats it. Makes a great trap.

name: Drugged Meat
description: Raw Meat that puts whatever eats it to sleep. Makes a great trap.

name: Burnt Meat
description: This is burnt to a crisp. It will drain your stamina.

name: Rare Steak
description: Provides a small boost to your Stamina. This one's still red in the middle.

name: Well-done Steak
description: Provides a medium boost to your stamina. Meat done right!

name: Hot Meat
description: Warms the body, wards off the cold, and restores a moderate amount of Stamina.

name: Chilled Meat
description: Cools the body, wards off the heat, and restores a moderate amount of Stamina.

name: Pink Liver
description: Pungent liver obtained from certain monsters. Not popular with humans.

name: Ethnic Wyvrnmeat
description: Rare, stringy meat from a horned wyvern found abroad. Not popular with humans.

name: Normal S Lv1
description: Non-specialized ammo.

name: Normal S Lv2
description: Non-specialized ammo. More powerful than Lv1.

name: Normal S Lv3
description: Non-specialized ammo that ricochets, resulting in high damage.

name: Pierce S Lv1
description: Armor-piercing ammo that deals multiple hits to some monsters.

name: Pierce S Lv2
description: Armor-piercing ammo. Higher-level ammo deals additional hits.

name: Pierce S Lv3
description: Armor-piercing ammo. This highest level deals the most hits.

name: Pellet S Lv1
description: Ammo that hits a wide area. Deals multiple hits at close range.

name: Pellet S Lv2
description: Ammo that hits a wide area. Higher-level ammo deals additional hits.

name: Pellet S Lv3
description: Ammo that hits a wide area. This highest level deals the most hits

name: Crag S Lv1
description: Powerful ammo that lodges in a target, then explodes.

name: Crag S Lv2
description: Very powerful ammo that lodges in a target, then explodes.

name: Crag S Lv3
description: Extremely powerful ammo that lodges in a target, then explodes.

name: Clust S Lv1
description: Fragments into three shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

name: Clust S Lv2
description: Fragments into four shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

name: Clust S Lv3
description: Fragments into five shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

name: WyvernFire Lv1
description: Ammo based on research into a wyvern's fiery breath. Can be rapid-fired.

name: WyvernFire Lv2
description: Ammo based on research into a wyvern's fiery breath. Can be rapid-fired.

name: WyvernFire Lv3
description: Ammo based on research into a wyvern's fiery breath. Can be rapid-fired.

name: Sub S Lv1
description: Ammo that gains power when used underwater.

name: Sub S Lv2
description: Ammo that gains power when used underwater. Deals more hits than Lv1.

name: Recover S Lv1
description: Ammo that restores a small amount of Health to the target.

name: Recover S Lv2
description: Ammo that restores a moderate amount of Health to the target.

name: Poison S Lv1
description: Ammo dipped in poison. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Poison S Lv2
description: Ammo dipped in deadly poison. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Para S Lv1
description: Ammo that causes paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Paa S Lv2
description: Ammo that paralyzes quickly. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Sleep S Lv1
description: Ammo containing a sleeping agent. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Sleep S Lv2
description: Ammo packed with sleeping agents. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Demon S I
description: Ammo that fills the target with savage amounts of strength.

name: Demon S II
description: Ammo that fills the target with savage amounts of strength.

name: Armor S I
description: Ammo that hardens the skin, guarding against attacks and Wind Pressure.

name: Armor S II
description: Ammo that hardens the skin, guarding against attacks and Wind Pressure.

name: Exhaust S
description: Special ammo that drains monsters' stamina.

name: Paint S
description: Ammo that marks a monster's position on your Map for a limited time.

name: Tranq S
description: Bowgun ammo used to capture monsters ensnared in traps.

name: Flaming S
description: Ammo that packs extra punch against monsters susceptible to Fire.

name: Water S
description: Ammo that packs extra punch against monsters susceptible to Water.

name: Freeze S
description: Ammo that packs extra punch against monsters susceptible to Ice.

name: Thunder S
description: Ammo that packs extra punch against monsters susceptible to Thunder.

name: Dragon S
description: Mysterious ammo that won't work in regular Bowguns.

name: Slicing S
description: Special ammo that ejects sharp blades on impact. Can it sever tails?

name: Book of Combos 1
description: An introductory text for first-time combiners. Improves your success rate.

name: Book of Combos 2
description: A basic text. Owning Book 1 and this improves your combining success rate.

name: Book of Combos 3
description: An intermediate text. Owning Books 1, 2 and this improves your combining success rate.

name: Book of Combos 4
description: An advanced text. Owning Books 1-3 and this improves your combining success rate.

name: Book of Combos 5
description: A pro-level text. Owning Books 1-4 and this improves your combining success rate.

name: Organizer Guide
description: An issue of Hunting Life magazine which explains how to maximize Item Box space.

name: Pack Rat Guide
description: An issue of Hunting Life magazine containing advanced item-cramming techniques.

name: Psychoserum
description: Temporarily sharpens your sixth sense and attunes you to the ways of monsters.

name: Catalyst
description: Works with other materials to enhance their effects. Cannot be used by itself.

name: Gunpowder
description: A dangerous substance that explodes when struck or heated.

name: Lifecrystals
description: Mysterious crystals long worshipped as a source of life.

name: Tranquilizer
description: Medicine that works as an anesthetic when Combined.

name: Bomb Casing
description: A base material for making hand-thrown bombs.

name: Dung Bomb
description: Releases an odor monsters find repulsive. It may even drive them away... or not.

name: Paintball
description: Toss this scented paint at a monster to mark it, allowing you to track its position.

name: Flash Bomb
description: Flashes brightly on impact. Toss this right under a monster's nose to blind it.

name: Sonic Bomb
description: A grenade-like item that emits a high frequency blast of sound on detonation.

name: Tranq Bomb
description: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Creates a large cloud of smoke wherever it lands.

name: Poison Smoke Bmb
description: Contains a toxic chemical. Also popular as a household bug bomb.

name: Farcaster
description: Instantly transports you back to base camp.

name: Spider Web
description: A very sticky web.

name: Net
description: A sturdy net able to support a certain amount of weight without breaking.

name: Trap Tool
description: A tool you'll need to put a Pitfall Trap or other traps together with.

name: Pitfall Trap
description: Activates when something heavy walks across. Use this to capture monsters.

name: Shock Trap
description: Immobilizes a target. You can use this to capture monsters.

name: Small Barrel
description: How many whiffs does it take to find out what was in this empty barrel? Just one!

name: Large Barrel
description: How many licks does it take to find out what was in this empty barrel? Just one!

name: Barrel Bomb S
description: A small time bomb. You can use it underwater.

name: GBarrel Bomb S+
description: A powered-up Barrel Bomb S. Small, but it packs a punch. You can use it underwater.

name: Barrel Bomb L
description: A potent bomb that detonates on impact. Waterproofed, so it still works underwater.

name: GBarrel Bomb L+
description: A powered-up Barrel Bomb L. Deadly. Waterproofed, so it still works underwater.

name: Bounce Bomb
description: Bounces into the air when set. This modified bomb requires skill to use.

name: GBounce Bomb+
description: An improved version of the Bounce Bomb. Requires some skill to use.

name: Felvine Bomb
description: Emits a scent Felynes love. Try hitting monsters with it.

name: Old Pickaxe
description: A cheap pickaxe with an easily nicked blade.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: A pickaxe with a reasonably strong blade.

name: Mega Pickaxe
description: A pickaxe tempered with steel. This one won't nick easily.

name: Old Bug Net
description: A cheap net for catching bugs. It tears easily.

name: Bug Net
description: A durable net for catching bugs.

name: Mega Bug Net
description: An extremely durable net for catching bugs. This one is made to last.

name: Fishing Harpoon
description: A must if you want to gather materials from fish. Weaken the fish, then harpoon away.

name: Mega Harpoon
description: A must if you want to gather materials from fish. Weaken the fish, then harpoon away.

name: BBQ Spit
description: Just what you need to cook meat. A must-have item for any hungry hunter.

name: Double BBQ Spit
description: Cutting edge BBQ technology! Hold the dash button while BBQing to keep on cooking!

name: Whetstone
description: A standard-sized Whetstone. Use it to restore a weapon's Sharpness.

name: Binoculars
description: Allow you to see farther and observe from a distance.

name: Hunting Horn
description: Used to attract certain monsters - blow at your own risk. May break when used.

name: Health Horn
description: Restores Health to those who hear it. May break when used.

name: Antidote Horn
description: Eliminates poison in the blood of those who hear it. May break when used.

name: Demon Horn
description: Increases the strength of those who hear it. May break when used.

name: Armor Horn
description: Bolsters the defenses of those who hear it. May break when used.

name: UW Ballista Ammo
description: Ammunition for a mounted underwater Bowgun.

name: Powercharm
description: An amulet that raises Attack. Just carrying this gives you demonic strength.

name: Powertalon
description: A powerful amulet that raises Attack. Made with a Deviljho Talon.

name: Armorcharm
description: An amulet that raises Defense. Just carrying this hardens your skin like rock.

name: Armortalon
description: A powerful amulet that raises Defense. Made with a Deviljho Talon.

name: Honey
description: Full of nutrients, but indigestible in this form.

name: Herb
description: Restores a very small amount of Health, but the flavor's not too hot.

name: Antidote Herb
description: A plant used in antidotes. It sometimes cures poison when eaten by itself.

name: Fire Herb
description: A wondrous, flammable plant.

name: Ivy
description: A vine of tough fibers. Woven, it is sturdy enough to hold a person's weight.

name: Sleep Herb
description: A plant containing sleeping agents.

name: Sap Plant
description: The sap it secretes is a strong adhesive. Careful you don't glue your Pouch shut!

name: Felvine
description: Melynxes' favorite food - they just have to steal it.

name: Cactus Flower
description: Possess antidotal agents, but it will not work by itself.

name: Airweed
description: Chewing it releases oxygen, but that's easier said than done__it's really sticky.

name: Hot Pepper
description: Blazingly spicy. Sure, it'll warm you up, but it's too hot to handle on its own.

name: Blue Mushroom
description: A well-known Combo material used to augment power. The deeper the blue, the better.

name: Parashroom
description: A mushroom that induces paralysis.

name: Toadstool
description: Logic says not to eat this poisonous fungus, but don't write it off completely.

name: Exciteshroom
description: This one has a very strange aroma... Edible? Only one way to find out.

name: Dragon Toadstool
description: A dangerous fungus said to suck the life out of the one who plucks it. Beware.

name: Nitroshroom
description: A hard-to-find mushroom with the power to generate blazing heat.

name: Huskberry
description: A berry that is hollow on the inside.

name: Paintberry
description: A berry with a shockng hue and an overwhelming scent. Look out: it WILL stain!

name: Might Seed
description: Temporarily raises your Attack when ingested by improving energy flow.

name: Adamant Seed
description: Temporarily raises your Defense when ingested by hardening tissue.

name: Dragonfell Berry
description: Eat this to cure Dragonblight and temporarily increase Dragon Resistance.

name: Scatternut
description: A nut that violently ejects its contents when struck.

name: Needleberry
description: A berry covered with needle-like thorns.

name: Bomberry
description: A berry that explodes when struck.

name: Firedouse Berry
description: Eat this to cure Fireblight and temporarily increase Fire Resistance.

name: Waterblock Seed
description: Eat this to cure Waterblight and temporarily increase Water Resistance.

name: Stormsender Seed
description: Eat this to cure Thunderblight and temporarily increase Thunder Resistance.

name: Icethaw Pellet
description: Eat this to cure Iceblight and temporarily increase Ice Resistance.

name: Stone
description: A rock with just the right heft for throwing. Tried and tested!

name: Iron Ore
description: Ore with high iron content. Can be smelted and forged into various equipment.

name: Earth Crystal
description: Crystallized microbes which are prized as an abrasive when forging weapons.

name: Machalite Ore
description: An ore harder than iron, but also several times more difficult to forge with.

name: Dragonite Ore
description: An ore that yields metal superior to that of Machalite. Rare and valuable.

name: Pelagicite Ore
description: Technically not ore at all, but rather prehistoric bone. Found underwater.

name: Carbalite Ore
description: An ore still being researched. It yields even better metal than Dragonite.

name: Bathycite Ore
description: Formed from prehistoric bones under high pressure. Never seen on land.

name: Firestone
description: Combusts even at room temperature. Its high heat can be used to fuse materials.

name: Firecell Stone
description: A magma-like deposit that only trained hands can properly work with.

name: Lightcrystal
description: An extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for crafting tools.

name: Isisium
description: A precious metal with countless uses. Gleams pure white in the light.

name: Gracium
description: A precious metal with countless uses. Gleams pale blue in the light. Valuable.

name: Antiseptic Stone
description: Combining an Earth Crystal and insect nutrients creates this. Not found in nature.

name: Ice Crystal
description: Ice that will not melt at room temperatures. Can be used to create denser ore.

name: Armor Stone
description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Combine with other materials to create coating for armor.

name: Armor Sphere
description: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to increase its strength.

name: Armor Sphere+
description: Fuse this high-quality Armor Sphere to existing armor to increase its strength.

name: Adv Armor Sphere
description: An advanced Armor Sphere. Rare in Moga Village. Save it for that special upgrade.

name: Hrd Armor Sphere
description: A hard, dense Armor Sphere. Use this rare item for more advanced armor upgrades.

name: Hvy Armor Sphere
description: A thick, dense Armor Sphere. Use this precious rarity to push armor to the limit.

name: Aquaglow Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in Decorations.

name: Sunspire Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in Decorations.

name: Bloodrun Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in Decorations. A shame that these are so high-end.

name: Lazurite Jewel
description: An indispensable item used in Decorations. This one doesn't come along often.

name: Mystery Charm
description: A modest good-luck charm. What does it do? Finish the Quest and you'll find out.

name: Shining Charm
description: A curious good-luck charm. What does it do? Finish the Quest and you'll find out.

name: Timeworn Charm
description: A powerful good-luck charm. What does it do? Finish the Quest and you'll find out.

name: Rustshard
description: A hunk of rock? No, it seems to be metal... With a little polish, it could be more.

name: Ancientshard
description: A fossil? No, it seems to be metal... With a little polish, it could be more.

name: Cricket
description: A fishing lure. Jumps amazingly far - sometimes right into a fish's mouth!

name: Worm
description: A fishing lure. Wriggles underwater, enticing those fishies to bite.

name: Firefly
description: A fishing lure. Its everlasting glow is a challenge to fish that says bite me.

name: Mega Fishing Fly
description: A fishing lure. Causes a feeding frenzy. No fish can resist this one!

name: Frog
description: Know any monsters good at fishing? Try fighting fire with fire.

name: Whitefish Bait
description: A fishing lure with chum that makes Whetfish go, mmm.

name: Sushi Bait
description: A fishing lure with chum that makes Sushifish go, mmm.

name: Tuna Bait
description: A fishing lure with chum that makes Tunas go, mmm.

name: Arowana Bait
description: A fishing lure with chum that makes Arowanas go, mmm.

name: Goldenfish Bait
description: A fishing lure with chum that makes Goldenfish go, mmm.

name: Whetfish
description: A fish with a dorsal fin hard enough to sharpen weapons with.

name: Sushifish
description: A fatty, delicious fish that restores a small amount of Health when consumed.

name: Sleepy Fish
description: A fish that contains sleeping agents.

name: Pin Tuna
description: A fish with jaws covered in tiny, needle-like spikes.

name: Popfish
description: A fish that literally pops when it dies.

name: Scatterfish
description: A fish that dashes itself to pieces when it dies.

name: Burst Arowana
description: A fish that bursts open when it dies

name: Bomb Arowana
description: A fish that explodes when it dies.

name: Glutton tuna
description: A fish that eats anything - allowing you to sometimes get items from its stomach.

name: Small Goldenfish
description: A rare fish that commands a high price, but beware its ferocity, rookies!

name: Insect Husk
description: The remains of an insect. You must be one hardcore collector to hang onto this!

name: Yambug
description: Named for its shape. Make fishing lures with it; its scent drives Tunas wild.

name: Bughopper
description: A roundish insect. Make fishing lures with it; its scent drives Arowanas wild.

name: Snakebee Larva
description: An unusual larva. Make fishing lures with it; its scent drives Goldenfish wild.

name: Godbug
description: An insect said to live 1000 years - but no one's lived long enough to prove it.

name: Bitterbug
description: Boosts your natural ability to heal when eaten. It also cures poison... sometimes.

name: Flashbug
description: A nocturnal insect sometimes found in daylight. They emit a bright flash upon death.

name: Thunderbug
description: Releases an electric shock when struck. Used to light rooms and start fires.

name: Killer Beetle
description: This insect's hard shell is often used as an abrasive.

name: Hercudrome
description: Said to be the world's strongest bug. Used in forging, cooking, and more.

name: Gluehopper
description: This bug's expectorations make for a strong adhesive that can bond any materials.

name: Rare Scarab
description: A rare and valuable insect that greatly assists in the bonding of metals.

name: Screamer
description: A monster organ that emits an earsplitting sonic blast when ruptured.

name: Poison Sac
description: A monster organ that contains a lethal toxin. Handle with extreme care.

name: Toxin Sac
description: A monster organ that contains a lethal toxin. Handle with extreme care.

name: Paralysis Sac
description: A monster organ that contains paralyzing neurotoxins.

name: Sleep Sac
description: A monster organ that contains a knockout powder capable of inducing sleep.

name: Coma Sac
description: A monster organ that contains dangerous powder. One whiff can induce a coma.

name: Flame Sac
description: A monster organ filled with flammable powder. Handle with caution.

name: Inferno Sac
description: A monster organ filled with powder that ignites if it so much as touches air. Danger!

name: Frost Sac
description: A monster organ that contains a sub-zero liquid. Handle with extreme care.

name: Freezer Sac
description: A monster organ with tremendous freezing power.

name: Dash Extract
description: A mysterious substance that can be culled from certain monsters.

name: Pale Extract
description: Has the ability to amplify the effects of certain medicines.

name: Monster Fluid
description: Sticky fluid that is often found in insects after they feast.

name: Monster Broth
description: A broth made from only the thickest of a monster's juices. Quite rich.

name: Monster Bone S
description: A handy material used to make everything from equipment to sundries.

name: Monster Bone M
description: A nicely-sized bone. Strong yet flexible, it's as reliable as steel and wood.

name: Monster Bone L
description: Wyvern bone needed to craft larger items. The right item will fuse this to a shell.

name: Mystery Bone
description: A weathered bone. Not sturdy enough to use in forging.

name: Unknown Skull
description: An animal skull worn and weathered beyond identification.

name: Bone
description: A long, thin bone. Junk, no matter how you slice it, but not completely worthless.

name: Monster Bone+
description: A top-quality monster bone. Hard to find, but vital for crafting powerful equipment.

name: Bird Wyvern Bone
description: A bone from a Jaggi or other bird wyvern. Small in size, but high in quality.

name: Dragonbone Relic
description: A curiously unfossilized bone from a dragon that once roamed these lands.

name: Bone Husk S
description: Used as a bone ammo casing. Produces sturdier results than a Huskberry.

name: Bone Husk L
description: A large flying wyvern's vertebra. As ammo casing, it can withstand heavy blasts.

name: Broken Shell
description: A beautiful fragment__but, seeing as it's broken, it won't fetch much.

name: Black Pearl
description: The Hunting Fleet sometimes brings these back. The black glow fetches a high price.

name: Jumbo Pearl
description: A huge pearl__so huge, unfortunately, that it may be dismissed as a fake.

name: Beautiful Scale
description: An everyday Commodity. These amber fish scales must be traded in bulk.

name: Shining Starfish
description: An everyday Commodity. Part of the Hunting Fleet's catch. Must trade in bulk.

name: Armorfish Morsel
description: An everyday Commodity. These fish breed near Moga's shores. Must trade in bulk.

name: Fine Pelt
description: An everyday Commodity. These durable Kelbi pelts must be traded in bulk.

name: Power Paddle
description: An everyday Commodity. This Tackle shortens voyages by 1/2 day. Must trade in bulk.

name: Curved Fang
description: An everyday Commodity. These bird wyvern fangs must be traded in bulk.

name: Dragonbone Piece
description: An everyday Commodity. These can be converted to Resources or traded in bulk.

name: Abalone Piece
description: An everyday Commodity. These can be converted to Resources or traded in bulk.

name: Fossil Piece
description: An everyday Commodity. These can be converted to Resources or traded in bulk.

name: Stunning Quill
description: A quality Commodity. Even one of these rainbow quills makes a good trade.

name: Saturnian
description: A quality Commodity. Even one of these soil-dwellers makes a good trade.

name: Mystic Narwhal
description: A quality Commodity. Even one of these revered fish makes a good trade.

name: Perfect Paddle
description: A quality Commodity. This Tackle shortens voyages by 1 day. Also a good trade.

name: Moonlight Fang
description: A quality Commodity. Even one of these uncommon fangs makes a good trade.

name: Glittering Scale
description: A quality Commodity. This weathered fang glows white. Makes a good trade.

name: Giant Skull
description: A rare Commodity _. Use this massive monster skull for a Rare Trade.

name: Atlantis Crab
description: A rare Commodity _. It houses a precious gem. Use it for a Rare Trade.

name: Queen Needle
description: A rare Commodity _. Use this Bnahabra queen's needle for a Rare Trade.

name: Eldest Saturnian
description: A rare Commodity _. Use this oldest of soil-dwellers for a Rare Trade.

name: Ancient Skin Oil
description: A rare Commodity __. The R. Ludroth and Lagiacrus produce it. For Rare Trade.

name: Flamboyant Quill
description: A rare Commodity __. Use this shockingly-colored quill for a Rare Trade.

name: Queen's Spirit
description: A rare Commodity ___. Use this Rathian bone serum for a Rare Trade.

name: Vermilion Scale
description: A rare Commodity ____. Use this blisteringly hot scale for a Rare Trade.

name: Sea-king's Scale
description: A rare Commodity ____. Strangely, this scale never dries. For Rare Trades.

name: Odd Egg
description: A mysterious egg found only rarely in Moga Woods. Can be converted to Resources.

name: Dung
description: That's right: monster poop. The odor reveals (too) much about the monster's diet.

name: Super-sized Dung
description: Fertilizer for the fields. Aptonoth grow big... and so did this! Outperforms Dung.

name: Fertile Mud
description: Mud that Barroth roll around in. Nutrient-rich and great for farming.

name: Saturnian Trap
description: Fertilizer for the Farm. Use this to hunt for strange soil-dwelling creatures.

name: BugMaker! Pro
description: Fertilizer for the Insect Box. 10 bugs a drop, or we'll EAT a bug! it reads.

name: Funky Pheromones
description: Fertilizer for the Insect Box. Some monsters emit this scent, and bugs love it.

name: Shroom Germ
description: Fertilizer for the Shroom Box. This bacteria is found within certain monsters.

name: Shroom Germ+
description: Fertilizer for the Shroom Box. This bacteria can't be beat. It's the Germinator!

name: Bizzy Bees
description: Fertilizer for the Honey Box. Bred abroad, these busy bees never, ever rest.

name: Fish Finder
description: Improves the Hunting Fleet's catch when Fishing; less effective otherwise.

name: Treasure Tracker
description: Improves the Hunting Fleet's catch when seeking Treasures; less effective otherwise.

name: Spare Spear
description: Improves the Hunting Fleet's catch when Hunting; less effective otherwise.

name: Power Paddle
description: An everyday Commodity. This Tackle shortens voyages by 1/2 day. Must trade in bulk.

name: Perfect Paddle
description: A quality Commodity. This Tackle shortens voyages by 1 day. Also a good trade.

name: Pittance Fang
description: A wyvern fang from Moga Woods with little value. Sell it for pocket change.

name: Gold Needle
description: A needle obtained from certain monsters. Sell it for pocket change.

name: Fortune Fang
description: A monster fang from Moga Woods worth a great deal. Sell it for a tidy sum.

name: Wyverngold
description: A gold rock crystallized in a wyvern's belly over dozens of years. Worth a fortune.

name: Pirate Booty
description: The treasure of the Pirate King, arr! Who knows what riches it be sellin' for?

name: Steel Egg
description: A egg of glittering steel. Very valuable and rare, but of no use to a hunter.

name: Silver Egg
description: A egg of glittering silver. Very valuable and rare, but of no use to a hunter.

name: Golden Egg
description: An egg of glittering gold. Insanely valuable and rare, but of no use to a hunter.

name: Incomplete Crown
description: A crown of gold. On the brow is a hole for some sort of missing gemstone.

name: Crown's Gemstone
description: A pure, precious stone that was once set into a crown. Valuable even on its own.

name: Dazzling Crown
description: A sophisticated symbol of wealth that shines like the sun. Everybody wants one!

name: Voucher
description: Redeem this for a special meal with stronger effects than usual.

name: Gourmet Voucher
description: Exchange this for a kingly meal. Both its flavor and effects are top notch.

name: Sharq Ticket
description: Trade this in for a rare stuffed Sharq__normal Quests won't get you one.

name: Black Gem Ticket
description: Trade this in for a crystal that swirls with darkness__the only way to get one.

name: Wyvrnhide Ticket
description: Trade this in for a thick piece of wyvern leather__the only way to get one.

name: Lightning Ticket
description: Applying electricity to this unique paper reveals a special weapon recipe.

name: Smith's Notebook
description: Contains weapon recipes and notes gleaned from the toils of a hard-working smith.

name: HellHunter Tag
description: Proof you have survived many onerous trials; used in the creation of special armor.

name: SoulHunter Tag
description: Badge of honor granted only to true hunters; used in the creation of special armor.

name: Dark Metal
description: An unknown metal from deep in the Tundra, it sucks the life from any who touch it.

name: Incomplete Plans
description: Recipe for a revolutionary weapon... or would be, if it had been completed.

name: Lion King's Seal
description: Used to forge a weapon that only those who finish a special Quest may wield.

name: Conqueror's Seal
description: Proof you have overcome countless trials, and a true badge of honor.

name: Commendation
description: A ticket awarded for a display of bravery. Collect enough and it might pay off.

name: Great Jaggi Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Great Jaggi in the Arena.

name: Qurupeco Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Qurupeco in the Arena.

name: R. Ludroth Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Royal Ludroth in the Arena.

name: Barroth Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Barroth in the Arena.

name: Gobul Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Gobul in the Arena.

name: Rathian Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Rathian in the Arena.

name: Rathalos Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Rathalos in the Arena.

name: Lagiacrus Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Lagiacrus in the Arena.

name: Barioth Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Barioth in the Arena.

name: Diablos Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Diablos in the Arena.

name: Uragaan Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Uragaan in the Arena.

name: Agnaktor Coin
description: A gift for defeating an Agnaktor in the Arena.

name: Deviljho Coin
description: A gift for defeating a Deviljho in the Arena.

name: Pinnacle Coin
description: A glorious coin given only to unquestioned Masters of Hunting. Beyond priceless.

name: Hunter King Coin
description: A silver coin given only to True Hunters. Its gleam is a symbol of your glory.

name: Unique Mushroom
description: A pinky-sized mushroom valued for its unusual aroma.

name: Choice Mushroom
description: The perfect shape and aroma. Even better than a Unique Mushroom.

name: Ripened Mushroom
description: A unique Mushroom made more unique by maturing its aroma and flavor.

name: Royal Rhino
description: A beetle with a jewel-like gleam. Prized by bug fans of all ages.

name: Crystal Bone
description: A unique bone prized in the village for reasons unknown.

name: Golden Bone
description: A glittering, golden bone. Popular with collectors.

name: Red Coral Stone
description: An item found underwater in these parts. Easy money!

name: Bloodstone
description: Is this crimson stone the relic of some ancient beast?

name: Powderstone
description: A rock that explodes with even the slightest jolt. Careful!

name: Goldenfish
description: A rare fish made of solid gold. Sell it for a tidy sum.

name: Monster Guts
description: Monster innards galore. A prized delicacy.

name: Popo Tongue
description: Popo Tongue are popular, healthy, and fun to eat.

name: Wyvern Tear
description: Mysterious tears wept only on special occasions.

name: Wyvern Egg
description: An egg taken from a flying wyvern's nest. Very fragile, so handle with care.

name: Herbivore Egg
description: An egg stolen from an herbivore's nest. It looks pretty tasty.

name: Paw Pass Ticket
description: Deliver to end the Quest. Maybe the Felynes will take you home...

name: Map
description: A map of the hunting ground.

name: Torch
description: Use this to light up dark places and stave off certain monsters.

name: First-aid Med
description: Restores a tiny bit of Health. It does a body... sort of good!

name: Ration
description: Slightly boosts current/max Stamina. Most hunters agree: it's gross.

name: Portable Spit
description: A Guild-provided BBQ Spit useful for novice hunters.

name: Mini Whetstone
description: A portable Whetstone you can use to restore Sharpness to weapons.

name: Mini Oxy Supply
description: An Oxygen Supply provided by the Guild. Truly a breath of fresh air!

name: EZ Shock Trap
description: Immobilizes a target for easy capture.

name: EZ Flash Bomb
description: A grenade-like bomb that flashes brightly on impact.

name: EZ Barrel Bomb L
description: A powered-up Barrel Bomb L (as potent as a B. Bomb L+). OK underwater.

name: Throwing Knife
description: A standard throwing knife. Flies straight and true.

name: Paralysis Knife
description: A throwing knife coated with toxins that paralyze a target.

name: Poison Knife
description: A throwing knife with a venom-coated blade. Poisons targets.

name: Sleep Knife
description: A throwing knife whose blade has been dusted with sleeping agents.

name: Tranq Knife
description: A throwing knife used for capturing monsters ensnared in traps.

name: Ballista Ammo
description: Ammunition for a large mounted Bowgun.

name: Cannon Ammo
description: Special ammunition for an anti-dragon cannon. Not fun to lug around.

name: Anti-dragon Bomb
description: A small time bomb that sticks to targets.

name: Ballista Binder
description: Ammunition for a large mounted Bowgun. Keep giants from moving!
